verses.verse: Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Also, you son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD<WH3069> to the land<WH127> of Israel;<WH3478> An end,<WH7093> the end<WH7093> is come<WH935> on the four<WH702> corners<WH3671> of the land.<WH776>

Now<WH6258> is the end<WH7093> come on you, and I will send<WH7971> my anger<WH639> on you, and will judge<WH8199> you according to your ways,<WH1870> and will recompense<WH5414> on you all<WH3605> your abominations.<WH8441>

And my eye<WH5869> shall not spare<WH2347> you, neither<WH3808> will I have pity:<WH2550> but I will recompense<WH5414> your ways<WH1870> on you, and your abominations<WH8441> shall be in the middle<WH8432> of you: and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>
Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> An evil,<WH7451> an only<WH259> evil,<WH7451> behold,<WH2009> is come.<WH935>
An end<WH7093> is come,<WH935> the end<WH7093> is come:<WH935> it watches<WH6974> for you; behold,<WH2009> it is come.<WH935>

The morning<WH6843> is come<WH935> to you, O you that dwell<WH3427> in the land:<WH776> the time<WH6256> is come,<WH935> the day<WH3117> of trouble<WH4103> is near,<WH7138> and not the sounding<WH1906> again<WH1906> of the mountains.<WH2022>

Now<WH6258> will I shortly<WH7138> pour<WH8210> out my fury<WH2534> on you, and accomplish<WH3615> my anger<WH639> on you: and I will judge<WH8199> you according to your ways,<WH1870> and will recompense<WH5414> you for all<WH3605> your abominations.<WH8441>

And my eye<WH5869> shall not spare,<WH2347> neither<WH3808> will I have pity:<WH2550> I will recompense<WH5414> you according to your ways<WH1870> and your abominations<WH8441> that are in the middle<WH8432> of you; and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD<WH3068> that smites.<WH5221>
Behold<WH2009> the day,<WH3117> behold,<WH2009> it is come:<WH935> the morning<WH6843> is gone<WH3318> forth;<WH3318> the rod<WH4294> has blossomed,<WH6692> pride<WH2087> has budded.<WH6524>

Violence<WH2555> is risen<WH6965> up into a rod<WH4294> of wickedness:<WH7562> none<WH3808> of them shall remain, nor<WH3808> of their multitude,<WH1995> nor<WH3808> of any<WH1991> of their's:<WH1992> neither<WH3808> shall there be wailing<WH5089> for them.

The time<WH6256> is come,<WH935> the day<WH3117> draws near:<WH5060> let not the buyer<WH7069> rejoice,<WH8055> nor<WH408> the seller<WH4376> mourn:<WH56> for wrath<WH2740> is on all<WH3605> the multitude<WH1995> thereof.

For the seller<WH4376> shall not return<WH7725> to that which is sold,<WH4465> although they were yet<WH5750> alive:<WH2416> for the vision<WH2377> is touching<WH413> the whole<WH3605> multitude<WH1995> thereof, which shall not return;<WH7725> neither<WH3808> shall any<WH376> strengthen<WH2388> himself in the iniquity<WH5771> of his life.<WH2416>

They have blown<WH8628> the trumpet,<WH8628> even to make all<WH3605> ready;<WH3559> but none<WH369> goes<WH1980> to the battle:<WH4421> for my wrath<WH2740> is on all<WH3605> the multitude<WH1995> thereof.

The sword<WH2719> is without,<WH2351> and the pestilence<WH1698> and the famine<WH7458> within:<WH1004> he that is in the field<WH7704> shall die<WH4191> with the sword;<WH2719> and he that is in the city,<WH5892> famine<WH7458> and pestilence<WH1698> shall devour<WH398> him.

But they that escape<WH6403> of them shall escape,<WH6412> and shall be on<WH413> the mountains<WH2022> like doves<WH3123> of the valleys,<WH1516> all<WH3605> of them mourning,<WH1993> every<WH376> one<WH376> for his iniquity.<WH5771>
All<WH3605> hands<WH3027> shall be feeble,<WH7503> and all<WH3605> knees<WH1290> shall be weak<WH3212> as water.<WH4325>

They shall also gird<WH2296> themselves with sackcloth,<WH8242> and horror<WH6427> shall cover<WH3680> them; and shame<WH955> shall be on all<WH3605> faces,<WH6440> and baldness<WH7144> on all<WH3605> their heads.<WH7218>

They shall cast<WH7993> their silver<WH3701> in the streets,<WH2351> and their gold<WH2091> shall be removed:<WH5079> their silver<WH3701> and their gold<WH2091> shall not be able<WH3201> to deliver<WH5337> them in the day<WH3117> of the wrath<WH5678> of the LORD:<WH3068> they shall not satisfy<WH7646> their souls,<WH5315> neither<WH3808> fill<WH4390> their bowels:<WH4578> because<WH3588> it is the stumbling block<WH4383> of their iniquity.<WH5771>

As for the beauty<WH6643> of his ornament,<WH5716> he set<WH7760> it in majesty:<WH1347> but they made<WH6213> the images<WH6754> of their abominations<WH8441> and of their detestable<WH8251> things therein: therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> have I set<WH5414> it far<WH5079> from them.
And I will give<WH5414> it into the hands<WH3027> of the strangers<WH2114> for a prey,<WH957> and to the wicked<WH7563> of the earth<WH776> for a spoil;<WH7998> and they shall pollute<WH2490> it.
My face<WH6440> will I turn<WH5437> also from them, and they shall pollute<WH2490> my secret<WH6845> place: for the robbers<WH6530> shall enter<WH935> into it, and defile<WH2490> it.
Make<WH6213> a chain:<WH7569> for the land<WH776> is full<WH4390> of bloody<WH1818> crimes,<WH4941> and the city<WH5892> is full<WH4390> of violence.<WH2555>

Why I will bring<WH935> the worst<WH7451> of the heathen,<WH1471> and they shall possess<WH3423> their houses:<WH1004> I will also make the pomp<WH1347> of the strong<WH5794> to cease;<WH7673> and their holy<WH6942> places shall be defiled.<WH2490>
Destruction<WH7089> comes;<WH935> and they shall seek<WH1245> peace,<WH7965> and there shall be none.<WH369>

Mischief<WH1943> shall come<WH935> on mischief,<WH1943> and rumor<WH8052> shall be on rumor;<WH8052> then shall they seek<WH1245> a vision<WH2377> of the prophet;<WH5030> but the law<WH8451> shall perish<WH6> from the priest,<WH3548> and counsel<WH6098> from the ancients.<WH2204>

The king<WH4428> shall mourn,<WH56> and the prince<WH5387> shall be clothed<WH3847> with desolation,<WH8077> and the hands<WH3027> of the people<WH5971> of the land<WH776> shall be troubled:<WH926> I will do<WH6213> to them after their way,<WH1870> and according to their deserts<WH4941> will I judge<WH8199> them; and they shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>
